titleStmt.title: A proclamacion sette furth by the kynges Maiestie lycencyng the exchaunges and rechaunges of money to be frequented and used, in all partes of his highnes realmes and dominions.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Geuen at Westminster the .xxiij. daie of Marche, in the .vj. yere of our reigne.
After imprint: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
